TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Smangus, title = Smangus, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smangus} }

S.FORM: == Smangus == i Hsinchu a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Smangus. u kasalumaluma' nu Smangus sa, 38 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 176 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 173 ku tademaw, pakalatu 98%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 3 ku tademaw, pakalatu 2%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 85%, Amis 1%, Paiwan 2%, Bunun 1%, zumazuma 10%. Smangus i Hsinchu a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Smangus. u kasalumaluma' nu Smangus sa, 48 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 233 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 223 ku tademaw, pakalatu 96%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 10 ku tademaw, pakalatu 4%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 91%, SaySiyat 1%, zumazuma 3%.

== Smangos == i Hsincho a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Smangos. o kasalomaloma' no Smangos sa, 38 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 176 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 173 ko tademaw, pakalato 98%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 3 ko tademaw, pakalato 2%. o kasabinacadan, Tayal 85%, Amis 1%, Paiwan 2%, Bonon 1%, zomazoma 10%. Smangos i Hsincho a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Smangos. o kasalomaloma' no Smangos sa, 48 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 233 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 223 ko tademaw, pakalato 96%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 10 ko tademaw, pakalato 4%. o kasabinacadan, Tayal 91%, SaySiyat 1%, zomazoma 3%.
